name: magnolia
text: Pat is a dish?

name: overmedicated
text: Pat IS a dish.

name: philosophe
text: Just look at panel 7.

name: lexsenthur
text: Philippe is surprised that Pat is such a dish.

name: waddlerz
text: Correction, Pat is a DICK

name: fosters
text: Sure, to a guy who can't see.

name: xiaomimi
text:
This has all been set up in advance !

[IMGS OFF]

name: pigs
text: Research chubby!

name: andrewthepig
text:
Pat's all in shape and everything, so if you dig his terrible fashion sense (like Rod) he would probably be attractive.

It's not until he opens his mouth that you want to kick him in the teeth.

name: phoenixultima
text: A comment left by phoenixultima was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Nurdbot, kylemcjuicy, equinn2006, sumbitches, prettyrad, wehavemagnums)

name: mira
text:
He ran off to get a towel AND his glasses.
It is awkward to talk to someone while totally naked, even if you are a gay porn star.

name: tekende
text: Roast Beef manages to do it all the time.

name: lawdog
text: Pat knows that true dishes follow up a session of onanism with a bit of hotel room putting.

name: juancarlos
text: I don't think Pat even touches himself, he just watches the porn and enjoys it more "illuminated" ways. e.g. working on his putting.

name: flavius
text: This sexual frustration could explain his being an ass all the time.

name: _cheesekayke
text: He's not so much anymore.

name: inordinate
text: Note: he doesn't have the porn with him, he has Braveheart .

name: panthera3000
text: I think this is another day altogether since it would have taken time to prepare for the video shoot and the time Pat had Braveheart he'd rented the two adjacent rooms so Rod couldn't have been taking a shower next door.

name: ivanstrel
text: The pun here is "Pat was really working on his putts."

name: woodenteeth
text: A comment left by woodenteeth was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by RiazM, Deusoma, equinn2006, sarabria, mystkmanat, STUART)

name: saint
text: A comment left by saint was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by ButterMoths, madnes, riotdejaneiro, gothfae, fosters, tttt2, bug, cryptfiend85, jollysaintpete, le_chien_manquee, caduceo, godfatherofsouls)

name: mortshire
text:
pat is so adorable here.

rosencrantz and guildenstern references = smiles from me.

name: saint
text: A comment left by saint was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by madnes, karljw, riotdejaneiro, jdhenry105, professorhazard, snowman, NeoNaoNeo, Mangtastic, sevenarts, gothfae, goocifer, odei, bug, equinn2006, jollysaintpete, fancypants, lucidaconsole, le_chien_manquee, caduceo, godfatherofsouls, aHatOfPig, Setzkin, nutmeg, TheGreatestCape, eRiUukFJk, NumberKillinger, mrn, Mastronaut, slalvation, wehavemagnums, tsolless)

name: mortshire
text: no, that's not me.  i'm not giving lames to anyone.

name: hollis
text: Good call!  I think it's a better idea to comment on someone's post than to just give it a lame.  I'm with you, mortshire.

name: mortshire
text: A comment left by mortshire was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by le_chien_manquee, dracer2, STUART, tsolless)

name: straw
text: This is similar to my approach.  I give many chubbies but only give lames when I actually say in my head, "Lame."

name: saru
text: I require a comment to basically surprise me so much with how bad the words are that the word "LAME" is physically ripped from my esophagus.

name: soticoto
text: Whereas I save up most of my lames for that guy with the dog avatar. He is such a douche.

name: saint
text: I love how my asking a douchebaggish question got me lamed fervently. People are awesome.

name: fosters
text: Same. If I catch myself rolling my eyes while reading their comment, then I lame it. Otherwise it's nothing but chubbies.

name: semiquaver
text: Yeah.  This is basically my approach to strip ratings.  I figure all Achewood strips are natural 5s, so rating them less would be misleading.  Therefore, I give 5s to my favorites and never vote lower.

name: achilleselbow
text: Who lamed this? God, it's like not only are people such assholes, but they're fucking proud of it. Of course, not so proud that they'd actually speak up and let their identities be known. Fucking assholes.

name: alzuna
text:
I'm the same way, I feel compelled to look through and find the comment that someone deemed lame...I haven't done that yet though, just thought about it.
It has to bee extreme cases for me to actually lame something...

name: alzuna
text: *be man, also unexplained lames make me sad.

name: mugi
text: Yeah, I was happy to see that reference.

name: billyamericana
text: Apparently Juilliard also excels at producing gay porn actors, too.

name: retardo
text: A comment left by retardo was marked as spam and excluded. retardo: What a douche. (reported by equinn2006, Saint, flynn)

name: alejandroadam
text: A comment left by alejandroadam was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by NeoNaoNeo, gothfae, MrMacky, Audhumla)

name: retardo
text: A comment left by retardo was marked as spam and excluded. retardo: What a douche. (reported by equinn2006, mistlethrush, Arcibi)

name: i_love_kate
text: Jesus Christ, man, when will you learn that you're not being lamed/marked as spam because of your choice of subject matter, but because of your extremely infuriating certainty that Onstad is a closet homosexual who requires your advice and cajoling to free himself?

name: saint
text: A comment left by saint was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by DR_MANFLESH_DESIRES_ANAL_PLAY_IMMEDIATELY, NeoNaoNeo, gothfae, twohundredninety, odei, bug, jollysaintpete, fancypants, lucidaconsole, le_chien_manquee, caduceo, nutmeg, Audhumla, mrn)

name: retardo
text: A comment left by retardo was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by straw, salo, Cypher, gothfae, cellphonedick, Prine, Psychopomp, shinsengumi14, tellumo, SotiCoto)

name: alejandroadam
text: dood. saint seems like a homophobe to me, I got no beef with you retardo, just thought your posts were getting lame and long and pointless.

name: hollis
text: Exactly.  I have no problem with the point you're trying to make, I'm just questioning your way of trying to make it, and I don't think it's very useful.  If you're interested in encouraging Onstad to "come out," why don't you send him an email directly?

name: semiquaver
text:
You don't have a problem with him attempting to hound a reasonably reclusive author with requests for sex?

I'm faintly worried that if Onstad actually starts reading Assetbar, we might see considerably less gay content in the strip thanks to retardo's work.

name: semiquaver
text:
People who make the same damn reference on every page get marked as spammers too.

RE: anyone who cares to chubby retardo, for any reason. Please read his posts. He's a troll. I doubt he's gay, he's certainly not for real because honestly no one could be this stupid, and he's abusing these boards. Lame, spam-blam, or ignore. Each of these things helps. Whatever you do, don't encourage his pathetic campaign.

name: dartigen
text: Achewood: Do Not Feed the Troll.

name: saint
text: Having re-read my post(s) regarding Retardo, I can honestly say that, while I was a flaming asshole about it, I was right about Retardo being a lame-ass spam poster. People championed him against me up there, but there comes a point where creepily suggesting sex to ANYONE crosses the border between "making a point" and "worthy of having a restraining order filed against."

name: retardo
text: A comment left by retardo was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by straw, ishuta, Nurdbot, gothfae, cellphonedick, Prine, achilleselbow, SotiCoto)

name: catachresis
text: If someone wrote 200 words on putting golf balls in a motel room, I'd mark that as spam

name: honesttom
text: Plus retardo's not discussing homosexuality so much as constantly pushing the same point in an effort to provoke controversy because he knows it'll get a reaction. I studied drama, about half the class were the same. Desperately wishing to be more interesting and so using their sexuality - which made them stand out - as a means of giving themselves false authority.

name: professorhazard
text: Nine months later, Doctor Manflesh is heralded as a hero for doing basically this very thing.

name: hateandwar
text: Yeah but Dr Manflesh rocks

name: wharfrat
text: im dissapointed that we didn't get to see where this goes...well not see...but you know

name: nurdbot
text: I must say this: Pat has some crazy haircut taste since he came out the closet.

name: cdl146
text: Is it just me, or does Rod Huggins get progressively thinner as this strip progresses?

name: isunklower
text: Maybe he's sucking in his gut to impress Pat.

name: fatcat
text: That is what I had assumed as well. Especially after callin' Pat a "dish."

name: robobogle
text: Golf! Oh man I was worried there for a little bit.

name: pitseleh
text: No alt text post? The alt text made me nearly pee myself: "The idea is, they get so panicked about the forgotten picnic basket that they fuck."

name: norrin
text: Typical pron movie logic.

name: morbo
text: Why can't life be more like a porn film?

name: tekende
text:
I love the phrase "The idea is." I don't know why. It just makes me want to laugh, no matter what the idea actually is.

"The idea is that the AIDS virus is eventually going to wipe out every person on earth."
"Hee hee hee!"

name: paperboy_2000
text: How are you going to keep them down on the farm once they've seen Rod Huggins?

name: srennick
text: This might be the single best alt text in the entire run of the script.

name: jollysaintpete
text: agreed

name: hypoluxa
text:
Yes.
Yet another case of the alt text making me vote this one higher.

name: dwodles
text: I kind of hate when people comment on achewood strips with "I say ____ all the time now. Thanks achewood!" But I really would like to incorporate "sugar factory" into my terms-of-endearment vocabulary.

name: drago25
text: Awww.

name: theora
text: Aww...exactly. Why does it give me warm fuzzies to see previously unlikeable characters find (potential) love with each other? Not that Rod was as much of a dick as Pat, but, you know, just knowing that every lock has its key and so on...

name: wigglestick
text:
Now that Pat has let his hair grow out some, every time I see the back of his head, I think it looks like someone has skinned a squirrel and thrown the hide over his scalp.

Check out panel 9 and see if you can feel where I'm coming from, here.

name: tekende
text:
I feel it.

I feel it ever so gently.

name: metatronatra
text: The Alt text makes this one.

name: saulbellow
text: the last panel reveals that Pat's hair is actually a dead bat with its heart cut out

name: autrepoupee
text: Cobbler AND cake, hee hee hee.

name: greenkoolayd
text: im stealing all of rods terms of endearment.

name: duperando
text: Panel 6 is just so creepy. Rod Huggins, walking slowly through a hole in the wall, donning nothing but a towel and glasses, and he is whistling.

name: awksedperl
text: Heh: Trot Husky.
